articles.description: The Formula 1 ace, 36, tested positive for the virus less than 24-hours after winning the Bahrain Grand Prix on November 29th, but has since made a full recovery despite losing close to a stone in weight.
articles.content:
Lewis Hamilton gave fans a progress report on Monday as he works on his fitness after recovering from the physical effects of COVID-19.
